comment.author: 29096601@N00
comment._content:
... 3 quarts of brown gravy soup & some [would?] black pepper: with eight or ten ripe tomatoes: let it boil an hour & half & pulp it through a sieve. Serve it with fried bread cut in dice.

Tomato Wine
Take small ripe tomatoes pick off the stems, put them in a basket or tub, wash clean then mash well & strain through a linen rag - a bushel will make 5 gallons pure: then add 2 1/2 or 3 lbs of good brown sugar to each gallon- then put it in a cask [of del?]-  it ferment as for raspberry wine. If two . . .
